Uses of Interface
Catalano.Neuro.IActivationFunction

  • Packages that use IActivationFunction 
    Package Description
    Catalano.Neuro
    The Catalano.Neuro namespace contains interfaces and classes for neural networks computations.

    • Uses of IActivationFunction in Catalano.Neuro

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BipolarSigmoidFunction
      Bipolar sigmoid activation function.
      class  SigmoidFunction
      Sigmoid activation function.
      class  ThresholdFunction
      Threshold activation function.
